flawed_nl_solution:
He needs 18.0 valentine's cards because 30 x 0.6 = <<30*0.6=18.0>>18.0
He will spend $36.0 on these because 18.0 x 2 = <<18.0*2=36.0>>36.0
The proportion of his income spent is 9.0 because 36.0 / 40 = <<36.0/40=9.0>>9.0
This is 900.0% of his income because 9.0 x 100 = <<9.0*100=900.0>>900.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.9, not 9.0. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
